entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow becoming mixed with rain near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
